backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing Digital Detox app with user profiles, challenges, focus sessions, screen time tracking, and authorization. Includes CRUD operations for profiles, challenges, focus sessions, and points/streak management.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old and new actor schemas for transitioning from health-focused profiles to Digital Detox user profiles with challenges, focus sessions, and gamification features.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including onboarding flow, dashboard, focus mode, challenges system, statistics, rewards, AI assistant, and settings with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary of frontend files describing components, pages, hooks, and styling for the Digital Detox application with wellness-themed design system.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes using warm wellness palette (sage green primary, warm neutrals).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for VitaSense application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication, view routing between 8 pages, onboarding flow display logic, and theme provider setup with bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/AiSuggestions.ts: Component displaying AI-generated personalized suggestions based on user patterns and focus sessions with categorized icons and warning highlights.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Sticky header with app logo, navigation menu for authenticated users (Dashboard, Focus, Challenges, Statistics), signed-in badge, and auth button.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
Displays a grid of achievement badges with locked/unlocked states based on user profile gamification data.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavigation: Mobile-only bottom navigation bar with five tabs (Home, Focus, Challenges, Stats, Settings) for view switching.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeCard.ts: Card component displaying challenge details with progress tracking for active challenges or a join button for prebuilt challenges.
frontend/src/components/CustomChallengeD: Modal dialog form for creating custom digital detox challenges with name, description, and duration inputs.
frontend/src/components/DashboardStats.t: Dashboard widget displaying three key metrics: current streak, total points, and user level in card format.
Confirmation dialog for resetting all user data including focus sessions, challenges, streak, points, and level.
frontend/src/components/ExitWarningDialo: Alert dialog that warns users about losing points when exiting an active focus session early.
Line chart component visualizing focus hours over daily, weekly, or monthly time ranges using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/FocusTimer.tsx: Countdown timer with circular progress visualization for focus sessions, including pause/resume controls and completion handling with points rewards.
frontend/src/components/LevelProgressTra: Displays user's current level, total points, and progress toward the next level with a visual progress bar and grid of unlockable level badges (Beginner, Consistent, Focused Mind, Digital Master).
frontend/src/components/MotivationalQuot: Shows a daily motivational quote from a predefined list, rotating based on the day of the year to encourage digital wellness habits.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingFlow.t: Multi-step onboarding wizard that collects user information (name, email, screen time goals, daily limits, focus duration) and creates an initial user profile with beginner level status.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for initial profile creation that collects user's name, optional email, and health goals, then saves a new beginner-level profile to the backend.
frontend/src/components/ReminderSettings: Manages notification preferences including screen time warnings and nighttime disconnect reminders, requesting browser notification permissions and persisting settings to localStorage.
Renders a bar chart visualization comparing screen time usage against daily limits across daily, weekly, or monthly time ranges using Recharts library.
frontend/src/components/ScreenTimeProgre: Displays current daily screen time usage as a progress bar with remaining time, showing color-coded status (green/yellow/red) based on percentage of daily limit consumed.
frontend/src/components/SignedInBadge.ts: Shows a badge with the signed-in user's name or truncated principal ID when authenticated via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/StreakHistory.ts: Visualizes the user's consistency streak with a large streak number and a 30-day calendar grid showing active days in accent color.
frontend/src/components/SuccessAnimation: Displays a full-screen success celebration card with animated sparkles, a success image, and earned points after completing a focus session.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile (DigitalDetoxUser) via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Comprehensive React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, challenges, focus sessions, and points management with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a calm blue and soft purple color theme for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AssistantPage.tsx: Page displaying AI-powered personalized insights and suggestions based on user profile and focus session patterns.
frontend/src/pages/ChallengesPage.tsx: Page showing pre-built and active user challenges with options to create custom challenges, displaying challenge cards in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying user welcome message, motivational quote, stats overview, screen time progress, quick action cards for focus sessions and challenges, and current streak display.
frontend/src/pages/FocusModePage.tsx: Focus mode page allowing users to select preset durations (25/45/60 min) or custom duration (1-180 min) to start a timed focus session with FocusTimer component.
Empty placeholder file for future AI insights functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero section, features grid showcasing focus sessions/challenges/rewards/analytics, and call-to-action to start the digital detox journey.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsPage.tsx: Rewards page displaying user's level progress tracker and badge collection achievements.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page for managing daily screen time limit, theme (light/dark), reminders, data reset, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/StatisticsPage.tsx: Statistics page with tabbed time range views (daily/weekly/monthly) showing screen time charts, focus hours charts, streak history, and overall progress metrics.
frontend/src/utils/aiAnalysis.ts: Utility function that analyzes user patterns from profile and focus sessions to generate personalized suggestions for screen time warnings, focus time optimization, streak encouragement, and detox tips.
frontend/src/utils/gamification.ts: Defines gamification logic including level progression (Beginner to Digital Master with point thresholds) and badge system that tracks user achievements based on points, streaks, sessions, and challenges completed.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for extracting and persisting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme with OKLCH color system, extended font families (Poppins/Inter), custom border radii, shadows, animations, and sidebar/chart color tokens.
project_state.json: Project metadata for a Digital Detox mobile app tracking existing features like onboarding flow, home dashboard, focus mode, challenges system, and statistics/analytics with Firebase backend architecture.
